content:
The Minister of Defense of the partially recognized Kosovo EUP Machedoncy at the 20th meeting of the Contact Group on Defense of Ukraine announced the second package of military assistance to Ukraine, which consists of mortar shells.

He is about itwroteThe Twitter Twitter.

“Kosovo will continue to support Ukraine in its heroic war against Russian aggression. Today, at a meeting of the Contact Group on Defense of Ukraine, I announced our second military assistance package for Ukraine, which consists of mortar shells, ”the post reads.

The Minister of Defense added that the first package of truck, tactical and armored vehicles will be delivered next week.

As reported by the Armyinform, the main topics of the meeting of the 20th meetingIn the format "Ramstein»There were: ammunition, air defense, F-16 and drones.
title: Kosovo at Ramstinin announced the second military assistance package to Ukraine
description: He wrote about it on Twitter. “Kosovo will continue to support Ukraine in it ...
author: Army Inform
